meaningMnemonic: This looks like an adjective, but it's actually a noun. This word is the same as the kanji meaning: <vocabulary>vow</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>oath</vocabulary>).
readingMnemonic: This has the same reading as 近い (ちかい). Just think about how when you're making a vow or oath, you become closer to the thing or person you're vowing to. You belong to them, in a way, which is why you become <reading>close</reading> (近い).
